title: 01/30/2021 - Up On Game with LaVar Arrington, T.J. Houshmandzadeh and Plaxico Burress -Can Patrick Mahomes Overtake Tom Brady? PLUS 4x National Champion head coach Bruce Rollinson
itunes:title: 01/30/2021 - Up On Game with LaVar Arrington, T.J. Houshmandzadeh and Plaxico Burress -Can Patrick Mahomes Overtake Tom Brady? PLUS 4x National Champion head coach Bruce Rollinson
description:
LaVar Arrington, T.J. Houshmandzadeh and Plaxico Burress debate whether or not Tom Brady could ever be overtaken by Patrick Mahomes as the greatest quarterback of all-time. Plus, they speak with legendary head coach and 4x National Champion Bruce Rollinson about the difficulties of navigating a football season during COVID-19 and the impact it’s had on student-athletes. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
